You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesO O] > &omacr;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Omacr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/014c/index.htm U+0014C].
  * `&omacr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/014d/index.htm U+0014D].
